description:
Aurum Cables 3.5mm Male To 3.5mm Female Stereo Audio Extension CableLooking for a way to use your iPod, iPhone, smartphone or mp3 player with your  home stereo? These high-quality, gold-plated aux-in and aux-out cable is the perfect solution!
Simply plug one end into the headphone socket of your music device and the other into the jack in your home stereo! This is great if you are far away can be used like an extension cord!This cable featuresa double shielding design to increase its durability and to last longer. It also features a beveled step design so the cable will fit over protective cases.
This cable is RoHS compliantGreat for connectingyour iPhone, iPod, Mp3, Kindle, Kindle Fire, Kindle Fire HD, Galaxy or any other tablet and Smartphone directly to your car or home theater system!
title: Aurum Cables 3.5mm Male To 3.5mm Female Stereo Audio Extension Cable - For iPhone, iPad or Smartphones - 3 Feet
